actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938, as amended (22 U.S.C. 611 et seq.) to eliminate unconstitutional provisions abridging the freedom of expression.
short_title: Foreign Agents Registration Act Amendments Act of 1985
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Foreign Agents Registration Act Amendments Act of 1985 - Amends the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938 to replace the term "propaganda" with the term "expression." Eliminates the filing and labeling requirement relating to information mailed by foreign agents.

titles.title: Foreign Agents Registration Act Amendments Act of 1985
A bill to amend the Foreign Agents Registration Act of 1938, as amended (22 U.S.C. 611 et seq.) to eliminate unconstitutional provisions abridging the freedom of expression.
